props.emptyText: Text to display when there is no content
props.errorText: Text to display when loading fails
props.loadMoreText: Text to display after loading successfully
props.parent: The parent element to listen for scroll events
props.threshold: The distance in pixels from the bottom of the content to trigger a load

events.onLoad: Load event, triggered when the component rendered at the first time or the content was scrolled to the bottom

contents.emptyContent: Content to display when there is no content
contents.errorContent: Content to display when loading fails
contents.loadMoreContent: Content to display when loading more
